page.title: 19BADMINTON AND ATHLETICS
page.content: Yeovil is the main town from which the Somerset schools badminton squad is picked.The u/14 team is picked by Mr.C.Chaplin and Mr.J.Wintersgill. Clubs are run at Westfield and Preston school through the winter months. An Athletics club is held at Mudford Recreation Ground.It is run on Mondays Tuesdays and Thursdays,from 6pm until 8pm.Non members have to pay a fee of 40p everytime they use the track. Members have to pay Â£3 at the beginning of the season and then pay 20p each time they train on the track. If you are a member you can run for Yeovil Olympiads Athletics Club,and these races are usually held on Saturdays and Sundays,and we race against other teams.
